isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 4: CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - CYLINDER HEAD INSPECTION - CHECK FOR VALVE LEAKAGE (USING MINERAL SPIRITS)

svcproc.title: CHECK FOR VALVE LEAKAGE (USING MINERAL SPIRITS)
svcproc.para: Visually inspect for valve leakage as follows:

step1.para: Position the cylinder head on wood blocks with the gasket surface facing down.
Squirt mineral spirits into the the intake and exhaust ports.

svcproc.para: Wait five minutes, use an inspection mirror and visually inspect the valve seat area for leakage of the mineral spirits.

note.para: THERE SHOULD BE NO LEAKAGE. RECONDITIONING IS NOT REQUIRED IF THE CYLINDER HEAD PASSES THE MINERAL SPIRITS TEST. IF LEAKAGE IS OBSERVED, THE VALVES REQUIRE RECONDITIONING. REFER TO "CYLINDER HEAD RECONDITIONING" IN THIS SECTION. THIS TEST DOES NOT CHECK FOR CONDITION OF VALVE GUIDE OR VALVE STEM-TO-GUIDE CLEARANCE
